Bernie Sanders said in a statement. That is extraordinary news and a real testament to the incredible courage of millions of people in that country who put their lives on the line in the fight for democracy. The goal now, which will not be easy, is for Egypt to make the transition to a democratic government with real legal safeguards. The United States must play an active role in helping the democratic forces in Egypt accomplish that. The Egyptian military, although highly respected by the nation's people, lives considerably better than the average Egyptian- a disparity the country will have to address as it moves forward, Patrick Leahy said.

In deciding who should take the business forward, we wanted someone with the right mix of leadership, vision and hard-core engineering chops,'' chief executive Steve Ballmer wrote in an email to company employees that Microsoft published. We wanted someone who could define the future of business computing and further expand our ability to bring the cloud to business customers and developers in game-changing ways. One of the feathers in Satya Nadella 's cap includes leading the technical efforts on the launch of Microsoft's Bing search engine, new releases of MSN, and the integration of Yahoo! across Bing and adCenter.
